short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My PromptBook is a powerful and simple tool that stores prompts for AI. Retrieve them from the clipboard whenever you need them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: My PromptBook is a powerful Chrome extension that allows you to save and store prompts for AI. With My PromptBook, you can easily capture and store AI prompts for future reference. Whether it's for brainstorming ideas, generating creative content, or conducting research, My PromptBook acts as your personal prompt repository. Simply save the prompts within the extension and retrieve them from the clipboard whenever you need them.
